Reviews.Title: Cute
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: This camera is so cute.  Don't expect it to be super hi end.  It's just a digital camera.  I get such a kick that I can shoot and film with a preview screen to help me to see what I am doing.  This is excellent for someone doing self portraits and vlogs.

ProductInfo.Features:
1.5" Dual View Front LCD
SMART features - Social Media Upload, E-mail, Direct Link, Mobile Link
PC Auto-backup, Remote Viewfinder, All share, Cloud Service
720p HD Video
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Dual-View Smart Camera w/ Built-in Wi-Fi in Cobalt Black + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
